CustomField.description: When true, only the resource's description is shown. When false, Contact Fields 1 to 3 are shown if they contain a valid API name of a field in the contact object. The default value is false.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When true, only the resource's description is shown. When false, Contact Fields 1 to 3 are shown if they contain a valid API name of a field in the contact object. The default value is false.
CustomField.label: Display Resource Description
